Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Ken W. "No lie!"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 11-year-old niece and she seemed to like it. However, it would not be acceptable to most adults. The display screen is tiny and the menus and buttons are not very intuitive and hard to read.  Overall the camera feels very cheap and toy-like. I did not download any pictures to the computer but the picture quality on the microscopic display looked fair-to-poor. Spend a few more bucks and get a "real" camera like a Canon or Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Johnny R. Deleon
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine, but will not allow for a 4 gb memory card to work in it, it freezes the camera up for some reason.

Reviews.Title: negative
Reviews.Author: Lillian Barnes
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed in this product. The photos are not clear and the color is poor.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this camera
Reviews.Author: pinkcaddielady
Reviews.Content: This camera arrived looking just fine, packaged professionally, etc. However, when I turned it on, there were lines going through the screen and it was also very large and awkward for a digital camera.I will say, however,that it has a hassel free return. Thank you Amazon for being true to your word about that, though I was a bit disappointed that I was not reimbursed for my postage. It should not be my liability for receiving damaged goods.
